title: The Days Lost
description: What if you discovered a mystery that could change your life and those around you forever?Ellie Morales is trying to overcome the grief of losing her mother. Sam Gantry is torn between doing what is right and what is expected. He is running from his past, but he has no idea just how far he has traveled. Deep in the woods of the Blue Ridge Mountains, their paths cross. Together they embark on an adventure and unravel the mystery that can't be explained. And once they find the answer, there is no going back.This is a story about finding love where you least expect it and opening your heart and mind to what's unknown.
author: Shannon McCrimmon
